promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic deer normal-type pokemon wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Antlerite, a a dynamic basic deer normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Floe Return, Stone Generator. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "normal" or "Antlerite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, deer-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This lithe forest dweller with majestic embellished crown generates minerals for defense. Using Floe Return, it controls ice to evade predators.
